body.p: You can create custom actions for the AI Positron Assistant add-on.

Two sample actions can be found here:
Wrap action names in the uicontrol element.
A Thesaurus custom action which proposes synonyms for the current selected word(s).
The custom actions should be already available for use in the Actions drop down.

note.p: This facility is not compatible with the WebAuthor in-browser editor where custom actions need to be defined on the server side.
